statements: DELETE FROM claim_settlements WHERE settlement_status = 'Pending' AND policyholder_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type = 'Medical' AND analysis_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date < '2022-01-01' AND claim_id IN (SELECT claim_id FROM claim_settlements WHERE claim_amount > 5000);
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type = 'upward' AND trend_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM claim_settlements WHERE claim_id = 100 AND settlement_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM claim_details WHERE customer_id = 500 AND claim_date > '2020-05-01';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE data_category = 'Claims' AND record_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM policy_details WHERE policy_holder_name = 'Alice Smith';
